name: Solar Destruction
description: This game is very addictive and awesome. The story of this game is about solar system destruction by aliens. In this game aliens want to destroy humans solar system by placing bombs on the orbits of each planet so you have to save the solar system by tapping on bombs to remove them.  All the assets including (art, music)  in the game  are taken from unity assets store and https://opengameart.org/.
